entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of freezing rain this evening then to periods of snow near midnight. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5 except temperature rising to zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 5 except temperature rising to zero along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
